titlestmt.titleproper: A Guide to the Broad Street Improvements-Papers of Sue Bachtel, 1963-1991
titlestmt.subtitle: Broad Street Improvements-Papers of Sue Bachtel Record Group 1-1

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using a form and manually entry 2023-03-03

titlepage.titleproper: Broad Street Improvements-Papers of Sue Bachtel, 1963-1991
titlepage.subtitle:
A Collection in
Mary Riley Styles Public Library Record Group 1-1

did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.repository: Falls Church History Room, Mary Riley Styles Public Library
did.unittitle: Broad Street Improvements-Papers of Sue Bachtel, 1963-1991
did.langmaterial: Materials in this collection are in English.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: The collection is open for research use.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: These two boxes contain Sue Bachtel’s chronological files of her involvement with the process of designing, planning, funding, and determining the scope of Broad Street Improvements during the 1980s. Bachtel was a Council Member during much of the effort to widen and improve West Broad Street from West Street to almost Haycock Road. These files do not constitute a definitive reporting of the process of Broad St improvements, nor do they contain all the reports that are referred to in the documents as attachments.
These files do not constitute a definitive reporting of the process of Broad St improvements, nor do they contain all the reports that are referred to in the documents as attachments.
